description: This file defines a Flutter UI widget for an OTP verification screen, allowing users to enter an OTP code received on their phone and verify it to proceed to contacts.

classes.name: OtpScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays an OTP input screen for phone number verification.

classes.name: _OtpScreenState
classes.description: State class managing OTP input, validation, and navigation logic within OtpScreen.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes the TextEditingController to free resources.

methods.name: _verify
methods.description: Validates the OTP code entered by the user, calls authentication verifyCode, and navigates on success or displays error.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the OTP input page including input field, messages, and verify button.
